com.basho.riak.client.core

Class RiakNode.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.RiakNode.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RiakNode

    public static class RiakNode.Builder
extends Object
    Builder used to construct a RiakNode.

      • withMinConnections

        public RiakNode.Builder withMinConnections(int minConnections)
        Set the minimum number of active connections to maintain. These connections are exempt from the idle timeout.
        Parameters:
        minConnections - - number of connections to maintain.
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_MIN_CONNECTIONS

      • withMaxConnections

        public RiakNode.Builder withMaxConnections(int maxConnections)
        Set the maximum number of connections allowed. A value of 0 sets this to unlimited.
        Parameters:
        maxConnections - - maximum number of connections to allow
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS

      • withIdleTimeout

        public RiakNode.Builder withIdleTimeout(int idleTimeoutInMillis)
        Set the idle timeout used to reap inactive connections. Any connection that has been idle for this amount of time becomes eligible to be closed and discarded unless minConnections has been set via withMinConnections(int)
        Parameters:
        idleTimeoutInMillis - - idle timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_IDLE_TIMEOUT

        Returns:

        See Also:

      • withExecutor

        public RiakNode.Builder withExecutor(ScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Provides an executor for this node to use for internal maintenance tasks. If not provided one will be created via Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor()
        Parameters:
        executor - the ScheduledExecutorService to use.
        Returns:
        this

      • withBootstrap

        public RiakNode.Builder withBootstrap(io.netty.bootstrap.Bootstrap bootstrap)
        Provides a Netty Bootstrap for this node to use. If not provided one will be created with its own NioEventLoopGroup.
        Parameters:
        bootstrap -
        Returns:
        this

      • withBlockOnMaxConnections

        public RiakNode.Builder withBlockOnMaxConnections(boolean block)
        Set whether to block if all connections are in use.

        If a maximum number of connections is specified and all those connections are in use, the default behavior when an operation is submitted to a node is to fail-fast and return. Setting this to true will cause the call to block (fair-scheduled, FIFO) until a connection becomes available.

        Parameters:
        block - whether to block when an operation is submitted and all connections are in use.
        Returns:
        this

      • withAuth

        public RiakNode.Builder withAuth(String username,
                                 String password,
                                 KeyStore trustStore)
        Set the credentials for Riak security and authentication.

        Riak supports authentication and authorization features. These credentials will be used for all connections.

        Note this requires Riak to have been configured with security enabled.

        Parameters:
        username - the riak user name.
        password - the password for this user.
        trustStore - A Java KeyStore loaded with the CA certificate required for TLS/SSL
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withAuth

        public RiakNode.Builder withAuth(String username,
                                 String password,
                                 KeyStore trustStore,
                                 KeyStore keyStore,
                                 String keyPassword)
        Set the credentials for Riak security and authentication.

        Riak supports authentication and authorization features. These credentials will be used for all connections.

        Note this requires Riak to have been configured with security enabled.

        Parameters:
        username - the riak user name.
        password - the password for this user.
        trustStore - A Java KeyStore loaded with the CA certificate required for TLS/SSL
        keyStore - A Java KeyStore loaded with User's Private certificate required for TLS/SSL
        keyPassword - the password for User's Private certificate.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withHealthCheck

        public RiakNode.Builder withHealthCheck(HealthCheckFactory factory)
        Set the HealthCheckFactory used to determine if this RiakNode is healthy.

        If not set the PingHealthCheck is used.

        Parameters:
        factory - a HealthCheckFactory instance that produces HealthCheckDecoders
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.
        See Also:
        HealthCheckDecoder

      • build

        public RiakNode build()
        Builds a RiakNode. If a Netty Bootstrap and/or a ScheduledExecutorService has not been provided they will be created.
        Returns:
        a new Riaknode

      • buildNodes

        public static List<RiakNode> buildNodes(RiakNode.Builder builder,
                                        List<String> remoteAddresses)
        Build a set of RiakNodes. The provided builder will be used to construct a set of RiakNodes using the supplied addresses.
        Parameters:
        builder - a configured builder, used for common properties among the nodes
        remoteAddresses - a list of IP addresses or FQDN. Since 2.0.3 each of list item is treated as a comma separated list of FQDN or IP addresses with the optional remote port delimited by ':'.
        Returns:
        a list of constructed RiakNodes

      • buildNodes

        public static List<RiakNode> buildNodes(Collection<HostAndPort> remoteHosts,
                                        RiakNode.Builder builder)
        Build a set of RiakNodes. The provided builder will be used to construct a set of RiakNodes using the supplied hosts.
        Parameters:
        remoteHosts - a list of hosts w/wo ports.
        builder - a configured builder, used for common properties among the nodes
        Returns:
        a list of constructed RiakNodes

      • buildNodes

        public static List<RiakNode> buildNodes(RiakNode.Builder builder,
                                        String... remoteAddresses)
                                 throws UnknownHostException
        Build a set of RiakNodes. The provided builder will be used to construct a set of RiakNodes using the supplied addresses.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException
        Since:
        2.0.3
        See Also:
        #buildNodes(Builder, List)
